Package org.jlab.mya.stream.wrapped

Class WrappedEventStreamAdaptor<T extends Event,​E extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.mya.EventStream<T>
      • org.jlab.mya.stream.wrapped.WrappedEventStreamAdaptor<T,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Outer Event Type
    E - The Inner (Wrapped) Event Type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.Channel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FloatGraphicalEventBinSampleStream, FloatIntegrationStream, FloatSimpleEventBinSampleStream, LabeledEnumStream
    public abstract class WrappedEventStreamAdaptor<T extends Event,​E extends Event>
extends EventStream<T>
    Adaptor for classes wishing to wrap an EventStream. The Event Type may be different between the outer and inner streams.
